#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int arr[90];
void print (int );
 bool place(int k,int i)
 {
   for(int j=1;j<=k-1;j++)
    {
       if((arr[j]==i)||abs(j-k)==abs(i-arr[j]))
           return false;
    }
  return true; 
 }
 void n_queen(int j,int n)
 {
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    { 
       if(place(j,i))
        {
           arr[j]=i;
           if(j==n)
             print(n);
           else
             n_queen(j+1,n);
        }
    }
 }
 unsigned long long flag=0;
 void print(int n)
{   flag=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
      { 
        for(int j=1;j<arr[i];j++)
          {
            cout<<"-	";
          }
        cout<<"Q	";
        for(int j=arr[i]+1;j<=n;j++)
          {
            cout<<"-	";
          }
       cout<<"\n";
      }
   cout<<"\n";
}
int main()
{  int n;
  while(cin>>n)
 { flag=0;
   n_queen(1,n);
   if(flag==0)
   cout<<"Not Possible\n";
 }
  return 0;
}
